text:
@realDonaldTrump @nytimes Wow! @WhiteHouse Staff say U binge watch TV all morning, every morning.
FACT is U played a lot of Golf on $Millions of Taxpayer 💰 while #coronavirus was starting to fester in Jan & Feb. Had U acted then like SKorea & New Zealand did #COVID19 would have been under control.
